RUTAS ESTATICAS

R2
enable
configure terminal
ip route 10.0.0.0 255.255.255.252 182.168.1.2
ip route 182.178.0.0 255.255.255.0 182.168.1.2
ip route 182.178.1.0 255.255.255.248 182.168.1.2
ip route 182.178.2.0 255.255.255.248 182.168.1.2
